title: Meditate
description: Listen to a guided meditation to help focus yourself.

title: Talk to someone
description: Talk to a friend or a professional

title: Thought distancing
description: Thought distancing is a technique to quiet fears or intrusive thoughts

title: Video games
description: We'll set a timer for half an hour of your favorite video game.

title: Get lunch
description: Make plans to meet a friend for lunch.

title: Journal
description: Take 15 minutes to write about what's going on in your life.

title: Exercise
description: Do 15 minutes of your favorite form of exercise.

title: Watch TV
description: Watch a show on TV or Netflix.

title: Make something
description: Draw something, write something, or try a craft or hobby.
